event.ability_description: Choose a child to gain double bonuses to all stat gains for one month!
event.name: Stat Gains Doubled
event.description: Hey pal...I got this syringe of shark blood and rhinoceros testosterone...give this to a kid and they'll grow like crazy (x2 to all stat gains for one month)

event.ability_description: Well that event yesterday didn't go well! Fortunately, I can replay it! For a price...
event.name: Event Replayer
event.description: Well that event yesterday didn't go well! Fortunately, I can replay it! For a price...

event.ability_description: I can feel the grip of insanity upon me. I can sharply reduce my sanity for a sacrifice. A very high price to a very old god.
event.name: Child Sacrifice
event.description: I can feel the grip of insanity upon me. I can sharply reduce my sanity for a sacrifice. A very high price to a very old god.

event.name: Grandpa buys a car
event.description: {G} is tired of seeing {P} drive that old beater around. Wouldn't you like a nice, new car? Now, how much to spend...?

event.name: Grandpa's vacation
event.description: {G} wants the family to have a nice, relaxing vacation. The more you spend, the better the vacation will be!

event.name: Grandpa buys experimental gear
event.description: There's this illegal, Cambodian football gear that's been treated with tiger grease. It costs $500 and would give {C} a big edge in indoor football...

event.name: Grandkid's illegal gear discovered
event.description: Uh oh, {EG} tipped off a referee to {C}'s illegal, Cambodian football gear. The referee is demanding a $1000 bribe to keep quiet.

event.name: Parent gets in fatal car accident
Grandpa commits arson
event.description: What unseasonably cold weather! I remember back in the old days we would snuggle up by the fire on days like today.

event.name: Grandpa kills a cat
event.description: I'm hungry... I remember in the good old days when you could just kill a chicken by the side of the road and eat it.

event.name: Grandpa gets a doctor
event.description: Grandpa hasn't been feeling terribly well lately. A lot of sinister voices talking about a League. Fortunately, a doctor in town specializes in this sort of thing. For 50 dollars a month he can help you!

event.name: Grandpa goes fishing
event.description: Ahh, the summer is the perfect time for the most stereotypical grandpa activity there is. Fishing! I should take one of the kids!

event.name: Parent catches coworker stealing
event.description: {P} is dusting the files at work when they see a coworker stuff a handful of pencils into their pocket. Stealing! At work! Should you turn them in...?

event.name: Grandpa sells drugs
event.description: Kids at {C}'s school are under a lot of pressure to succeed in school. Seems like all the kids are taking adderall. Could make a healthy buck off that!

event.name: Grandkid finds classmate doing drugs
event.description: {C} steps out of the stall at school and finds a couple students doing crystal meth. Damn, that is some hard shit. Should you turn them in?

event.name: Grandpa's walk in the park
event.description: It's a beautiful fall day. I ought to take one of my grandkids for a walk in the park slash bonding experience.

event.name: Grandkid joins scouts
event.description: {C} is really interested in joining the Gender Neutral Scouts. They want to go camping and learn survival skills. Man, those scouts are losers! Should I let them join?

event.name: Grandpa rigs elections?
event.description: As you know, the student council elections are next week. One of your grandchildren are planning on running, but Grandpa isn't sure they have what it takes to win... Perhaps a little vote rigging is in order? I'm sure there would be no consequences.

event.name: Grandpa goes to the bar
event.description: Grandpa is always so fixated on this silly league, but sometimes it's best to kick back and relax. Grandpa wants to take another Grandpa to the bar.

event.name: Parent marries a stripper
event.description: {P} has been so upset ever since the divorce... Grandpa decides it's time for drastic measures. Strip club, baby! How much are you gonna pay this stripper?!

event.name: Grandkid tries out for football
event.description: The indoor football team is having tryouts! I wonder who should go out?

event.name: Football championship
event.description: Time for the indoor football championships. The tension in the room is palpable. You spot {EG} on the other side of the stadium and make eye contact. He pours his beer onto a small child. It's on. Good luck!

event.name: Honor Roll Announced
event.description: {C} tries for the honor roll.

event.name: Play audition
event.description: The school is putting on a play! Some garbage about saving the lemurs or whatever. Who cares, who should audition?

event.name: Play opening night
event.description: It's the big night! {C}'s play Stop the Lemur Genocide's opening night is tonight. The whole family is nervous, but especially Grandpa. He put everything on the line for this family. We owe him everything.

event.name: Valentine's Day
event.description: Love is in the air! Grandpa has never had trouble with the ladies, rawr, but God knows his grandkids could use a little advice in the love department. Who should Grandpa advise in this holiday season?

event.name: Grandpa's Birthday!!
event.description: It's the most wonderful time of the year! Lucky for YOU, Grandpa likes to go hard. We need to pick our most popular grandkid and parent to arrange this thing so EVERYONE will be there.

event.name: Arbor Day
event.description: Spring is in the air. Grandpa is a big proponent of the environment. Especially if he grows a tree bigger than any other family's tree! Choose a child to teach about the environment!

event.name: Fourth of July
event.description: Ah, America's independance day. Grandpa's father fought in that war. Probably. Anyway, seems like a perfect day for... sabotage. Let's set off some fireworks.

event.name: April Fool's
event.description: The prank holiday! I can think of one person I'd want to prank...

event.name: Wild party today
event.description: The only way to be a cool kid is to throw a cool party. {C} has plans to throw the coolest party ever. Obviously this is a good idea. Maybe pitch in a hundred bucks to make sure it goes off without a hitch? Extra money can counteract a lame kid, everyone knows that.

event.name: School dance
event.description: The most magical day of any child's life! The school dance. Where memories of awkward childhood nights will imprint onto their mind and follow them to their grave. Or not! Let's get this over with.

event.name: Student council elections
event.description: Ah, nothing is more holy and sacred in this great country than the democratic process. This is what our forefathers died for. Surely no one would sully this sacred ritual with fraud. Let's count the votes...

event.name: Take Your Grandpa to Work Day
event.description: It's everyone's favorite real life, not-made-up holiday! Take your Grandpa to work day! Who should Grandpa go with?

event.name: Field Trip
event.description: Time for {C}'s yearly field trip to the pumpkin patch/apple orchard. However, they're two chaperones short! Grandpa will go, obviously, but I guess a parent should go as well. Who?

event.name: Halloween
event.description: It's that spooky time of year again! The day when Grandpa can dress up like a serial killer and not get arrested for having blood on his shirt! Who to take trick-or-treating?

event.name: Parent-Teacher Conference
event.description: Time to measure how {C} is performing in school. This may be rough, who should I take along?

event.name: Professional Tutoring
event.description: After that disaster of a parent teacher conference, I think we need a tutor. Problem is it'll cost $200 a month!

event.name: Hospital visit
event.description: Time for your weekly visit to the hospital...Who should you take along? These hospital bills are starting to stack up...

event.name: School band auditions
event.description: Grandpa is not looking forward to sitting through these concerts but having a grandkid in the school band would be quite a boon! Who should try out?

event.name: Grandkid goes for the solo
event.description: The school band is having tryouts for the big concert solo! The band director's wife was just put into the hospital and he needs money badly... Maybe we could come to an agreement of sorts?

event.name: School Band Trip
event.description: The school band is going on a week long trip to see the grave of Elivs Presley and perform there! Can I go Grandpa? Can I?

event.name: Quarter Final Event 1
event.description: The first contest is a paint off. The camp counselor holds up a picture of a beautiful pastoral scene. Draw this... Begin!

event.name: Quarter Final Event 2
event.description: The second event is hosting a last minute dance party in the Rec Center. Whoever can get the most people to come wearing their colors wins!

event.name: Quarter Final Event 3
event.description: The third event is going to be a good old fashioned love-off. Just like the pioneers used to do. Which parent can tuck their children into bed and kiss them goodnight the best?

event.name: Semi Final Event 1
event.description: The children and parents have been working hard in these contests so far. Time for Grandpa to show his stuff. Wisdom off!

event.name: Semi Final Event 2
event.description: Everything is set up for the quiz show competition. The category is a mystery. Choose the child who will be your champion.

event.name: Semi Final Event 3
event.description: It's the parents' turn to show off their popularity. Which parent can host the best BBQ?

event.name: Grand Final Event 1
event.description: You've fought your whole life for this. {EG} is quite a contender. It's only fair that Grandpa goes first. It's an insanity-off! Whichever grandpa can write the most coherant term paper on the fall of the roman empire wins!

event.name: Grand Final Event 2
event.description: Time to find out which parent is smartest! It's time to see who knows the most about their grandpa!

event.name: Grand Final Event 3
event.description: It's the beauty pagent. Time to pick your cutest kid and have at it. Nothing wrong with child beauty pagents, right?
